meanings.definition: A device used to measure the angles and intensities of diffracted X-rays.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used diffractometers to study the X-ray patterns.
meanings.sent2: The diffractometers in the lab were essential for the research.
meanings.sent3: When the diffractometers started beeping, everyone knew an experiment was in progress.
meanings.sent4: The diffractometers acted like detectives, revealing the secrets of the X-ray beams.
meanings.sent5: The shiny diffractometers hummed softly, capturing the X-ray data with precision.
